mapper.select: select problem.id, content, answer, commentary, type, disclosure, writer, (select user.userid from user where user.id == problem.writer) from problem
select problem.id, content, answer, commentary, type, disclosure, writer, (select user.userid from user where user.id == problem.writer) from problem where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into problem (content, answer, commentary, type, disclosure, writer) values (#{content}, #{answer}, #{commentary}, #{type}, #{disclosure}, #{writer})
mapper.update: update problem set content = #{content}, answer = #{answer}, commentary = #{commentary}, type = #{type}, disclosure = #{disclosure}, writer = #{writer}
